entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
